ValidationRule.description: Prevent user changing Course Status to 'Cancelled' if any of Reserved_Places__c, Enquiries__c or Confirmed_Places__c are > 0
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Cancelled"), OR( Reserved_Places__c > 0, Enquiries__c > 0, Confirmed_Places__c > 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Course cannot be cancelled while there are Enquiries, Reservations or Bookings still in place.
